title: [Extension Proposal] code-server to embed "vscode" in dev ui

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

extension which enables to use code-server from quarkus devui.

![2023-11-21_10-11-27](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/54129/59dfa52c-7c6c-4412-ad52-1e5588d3cb1a)

Very much experimental for now as has bunch of issues but as the code turned out to be super trivial I thought - why not :)


### Repository name

quarkus-code-server

### Short description

allow to have access to code-server from dev ui

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-code-server/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- 
...


### Team Members

- maxandersen


### Additional context

prototype at https://github.com/maxandersen/quarkus-code-server
